Equipment Actions.Action 1: Bite, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 4 Piercing
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Claw, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 4 Slashing

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Troglodyte makes 3 attacks, one with its Bite and two with its Claws

Abilities.Ability 1: Chameleon Skin, The Troglodyte can blend into its surroundings
Abilities.Ability 2: Stench, Creatures too close to the Troglodyte become poisoned by its horrific stench
Abilities.Ability 3: Sunlight Sensitivity, While in sunlight, the Troglodyte has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight
